publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5028# Mrs Mary Mulligan: What Is Your Idea of Happiness?â€”That the Parliament congratulates the young people from the Chill Out Zone in Bathgate and the older people from Whitdale residential home in Whitburn for coming together to produce the DVD, "What is your idea of happiness?", which showed that, while there are many years difference in their ages, young and old share many of the same hopes and dreams and love of music and hopes that experiences such as this will bring about a greater understanding of those of a different age.
S2M-5028# What Is Your Idea of Happiness? (lodged on 27 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Michael McMahon*

S2M-5028# What Is Your Idea of Happiness? (lodged on 27 October 2006) Cathy Peattie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Maureen Macmillan*, Christine May*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Trish Godman*, Eleanor Scott*, Colin Fox*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-5028# What Is Your Idea of Happiness? (lodged on 27 October 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, John Swinburne*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-5028# What Is Your Idea of Happiness? (lodged on 27 October 2006) Karen Gillon*
S2M-5028# What Is Your Idea of Happiness? (lodged on 27 October 2006) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-5028# What Is Your Idea of Happiness? (lodged on 27 October 2006) Marilyn Livingstone*, Scott Barrie*
S2M-5028# What Is Your Idea of Happiness? (lodged on 27 October 2006) Helen Eadie*
S2M-5028# What Is Your Idea of Happiness? (lodged on 27 October 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*, Susan Deacon*
